snippet.title: Red Rogue Sea - 2025 First Official Trailer
snippet.description:
We’re proud to announce the first official trailer for Red Rogue Sea, a high-seas roguelike where every voyage is a new tale of danger, discovery, and daring escapes. Don’t miss our first official trailer, and join the demo on April 9th. 
Show your support by wishlisting on Steam - adventure awaits!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3200220/Red_Rogue_Sea/

- Original game Soundtrack by Mervol. Mixing and mastering by Enric Pascual.

#roguelike #strategygames #pirates #indiegame #steam #pixelartgames #wishlist #announcement #fyp #fypシ゚
